summary: Full-stack digital agency website using Node.js, Express, and Vite (React frontend) with admin login system
architectural_notes: Full-stack architecture: Node.js/Express backend + Vite/React frontend
Client and server separated into distinct folders
Frontend auto-served by Express (no separate dev server)
Single command startup: npm run dev
Client inquiry form integrated into public-facing website with backend submission handling
